introduce.title: Introduce the common-resolver
introduce.description: common-resolver is a universal library that simplifies and standardizes the resolution of recurring issues across various environments. Notably, it allows for the application of validation libraries such as zod, yup, and superstruct through a unified adapter interface, making it easy to swap and reuse validation logic. With minimal configuration, it can be quickly integrated and offers a modular design that ensures scalability and flexibility.
